name: Tomato Rice
description: This easy tomato rice makes such a great side dish! It's super easy to make, packed with flavor, and it's ready in less than 30 minutes.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup long grain rice (basmati or jasmine rice)

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the onion and the garlic. Roughly dice the tomatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Finely chop the onion and the garlic. Roughly dice the tomatoes.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some oil in a large pot and sauté the onion for about 2-3 minutes until translucent. Then add the garlic and cook for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat some oil in a large pot and sauté the onion for about 2-3 minutes until translucent. Then add the garlic and cook for another minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tomato paste and stir well. Cook for 1 minute. Then add the spices and cook for another minute until fragrant.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the tomato paste and stir well. Cook for 1 minute. Then add the spices and cook for another minute until fragrant.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rice and stir well. Add the vegetable broth.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the rice and stir well. Add the vegetable broth.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add the tomatoes and cook for 15-20 minutes until all of the water is absorbed and the rice is tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Then add the tomatoes and cook for 15-20 minutes until all of the water is absorbed and the rice is tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle with freshly chopped parsley and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle with freshly chopped parsley and enjoy!
